actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security

official_title: To authorize grants to States to fund arrangements between local police departments and public accommodations to have the accommodations serve as emergency domestic violence shelters.
short_title: Domestic Violence Shelter Coordination Act of 2003
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Domestic Violence Shelter Coordination Act of 2003 - Authorizes the Attorney General to award grants to enable the States to provide funds to local police departments to pay for hotels, motels, and other places of public accommodation to serve as emergency domestic violence shelters.

titles.title: Domestic Violence Shelter Coordination Act of 2003
To authorize grants to States to fund arrangements between local police departments and public accommodations to have the accommodations serve as emergency domestic violence shelters.
